transArray.content: Basically the same as the introduction and pictures, the location is in Qianmen Street Pedestrian Street, there is a 24-hour convenience store downstairs, and the subway station is just 1 minute away, very convenient. The room is clean and tidy. I booked a duplex room. There are toilets and bathrooms on the 2nd floor, which is very convenient. The same needs to be improved. There is no signal at all when entering the room, and the phone and text messages are not available. This is a bit troublesome
